website_summaries.verdict: This edgy-looking kendama is the perfect design to draw skeptical kids into the fad. Keep in mind, though, the painted face will chip over time.
pros: Comes with extra string and sticker
Funny, edgy-looking face wins over reluctant children
cons: Manufacturer advises that paint chipping is expected with normal use, so the fun painted face may chip off

customer_reviews.title: Kendama's are cool!
customer_reviews.text: The boys love them and after watching them I realized how much eye and hand coordination is used to do all the tricks with these. My kids took them to their doctors apt. to keep them busy while waiting and their doctor laughed because he has 5 children himself and said it's much hard than it looks. He has tried playing w/ his sons and it wasn't easy. It's amazing how the kids pick this stuff up. I think it is the perfect tool for a child that needs to work on eye and hand coordination!
customer_reviews.author: LoveofCali

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: My cub begged me to buy it. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: edward white

customer_reviews.title: Excellent skill based toy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and the big red face ball one also for my nephews who are electronically addicted. Surprisingly, they really enjoyed them and spent most of my visit trying to master this skill based toy. They both did by the end of the weekend. I have been told by my brother that they still play with it and like to challenge their friends.
customer_reviews.author: CBrounell

customer_reviews.title: Kaleb Kendama Sour Face
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea what these were before my kids asked for them for christmas, but they made great stocking stuffers as they were a big hit with everyone. Too bad the paint started chipping right away and by the end of the day there were chunks of the ball coming off, but I'm happy that they enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy T

customer_reviews.title: Bought two of these for my Sons for Christmas, ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my Sons for Christmas, I guess it's a little too advanced for their age groups (4 and 6). It's definitely a tough game/skill to get the hang of, but quality wise these are built well and are exactly what they advertise to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Daniels

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: i thought this might be fun but it actually tuned out more fun than i expected. one cup is smaller than the other. there's an extra string. a place to stick the ball at the top. and a funny face! screw computers when you have this.
customer_reviews.author: com

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: Cool little toy Very fun A bit frustrating but fun And for the price..definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: my 8 year old nephew did not own a Kendama yet so we picked this one out for him for his b-day. He loves it, it's cute in a very zombie, little boy type of way.
customer_reviews.author: J. Send

customer_reviews.title: Chips easily
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy and we bought one for a friend. I loved the design, but was disappointed that after 1 day the paint has chipped off and now after 3 days the face is almost gone. My son has a kendama made by another manufacturer and this was not an issue. Very disappointed in quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Butenschoen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gift for a kendama "starter". I got this one because he loves green.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Vava

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Wished I had spent more money on slightly better quality. Already used the extra string it came with less than 3 weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta Fancher

customer_reviews.title: So fun for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three of these for our kids and one for my hisband, they are having so much fun. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Brittwaters

customer_reviews.title: Loved this toy
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this. And the eyes glow in the dark. He was so happy with it we have since ordered another
customer_reviews.author: Cherylynne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was very excited to get this new non-battery toy.
customer_reviews.author: Bluehair Boo

customer_reviews.title: kaleb
customer_reviews.text: got this for my oldest for Christmas the head is beyond recognition at this point because he plays with it so much
customer_reviews.author: MIchelle

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! I highly recommend this to anyone with the kids, or the desire, to play with a Kendama.
customer_reviews.author: ebaf

customer_reviews.title: kendama
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old grandson loves it but after less than one week paint chipping, hence only 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: green toy
customer_reviews.text: It was delived quickly and in fantastic shape!! I love the color of the toy! I would absolutely order again!!
customer_reviews.author: marking pen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We loved it this am, now after 24 hours of normal use, the face is almost completely worn off. I now have a bummed 10 year old son.
customer_reviews.author: Happymum

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shipping and kid loves this thing - exactly as shown in picture...surprised at how quickly the paint chips.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the quirky face on it. It was exactly what he wanted. Product arrived on time and was at a great cost.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This came as expected in a timely manner and arrived as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: Grandson and all his friends are into the low tech Kendama games and all love it, He is playing with it every time I see him.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Gumbinger

customer_reviews.title: About the product
customer_reviews.text: There is no such Kendama in Japan. Expression drawn to the ball is very unique and interesting. In addition, I have you respond quickly dispatch of goods, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Atsushi Kataoka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson (9) loves it. All the boys have them, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsygirl7

customer_reviews.title: well....
customer_reviews.text: First of all I want to say that I know nothing about these toys except I remember these being around when I was little (let's not worry about my age right now 😄). My daughter wanted one because every other kid has one. She liked the character on this one and we bought it. lets just say that the face on this kendama was gone by the 3rd day. The paint had completely chipped away. The ball and the kendama have dents in the wood. Not sure if other kendamas are built better but I would definitely do research before buying my next one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Having fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandson had me order this for him. I guess it is a going rage at school. I remember having something like it when I was a kid. He is enjoying it greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be fantastic. I think my son will love this. I am thankful it came in an actual package/box so it can be given as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item was just as described and came right on time!
customer_reviews.author: paula teal

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a success with my 10 year old son. The quality is good and a year later it is still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Monia

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my 7year old for Christmas. ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7year old for Christmas. I received it just two days after I ordered it. It looks to be made to last, however we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: hiking mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES it! Delivery was super fast, arrived a day ahead of the scheduled date!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable & enjoyable Kendama
customer_reviews.text: The very first Kendama I purchased for my son was through Momma Kendama, and the paint on the ball chipped away with his very first uses. When he told me he wanted another one, I was hesitant at paying more money for something that looked horrible by day's end. So, I decided to order one thru Kaleb instead. My son has played with it nearly every day for weeks now, and there is only one noticeable knick in one side! The paint on this toy is so much more durable/better done than the first one we bought. We'll stick with Kaleb Kendama!
customer_reviews.author: JBurg

customer_reviews.title: My son is enjoying his Kendama what a great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was outstanding one ordered it Sunday was at my door step Monday morning. My son is enjoying his Kendama what a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ignacia Topete

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TOY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is awesome!!!! I love playing with it and it's face design is soo cute!!! I got this today and it is awesome!!!! 😄
customer_reviews.author: AMY SATTEL

customer_reviews.title: what I expected
customer_reviews.text: kids loved the funny faces and the colors!! Normal sized and what I expected .... however may need a clear coat over it before use to protect. Gets pretty beat up fast
customer_reviews.author: GuJo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the packaging and overall good kendamas. The paint lasted a bit longer than the plain kendamas.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Gomez

customer_reviews.title: The popular toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it....it is all he wanted and plays with it every day. Last night he showed me tricks that he has learned to do on it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These work exactly as expended. Kids are having a great time playing with them. Not much can go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mott

customer_reviews.title: Best Toy Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these. They are great! They do chip, but you have to expect that with wood hitting wood. The strings have not broke (we have had 1 for a year already) yet they provide an extra one. My kids use these every day. So great for hand eye cordnation and to keep them off of screen time.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Roland

customer_reviews.title: Guess okay
customer_reviews.text: Grandson in Vegas still trying to figure it out. Could have pick one up at CVS for $14.99 felt over charged and it s the latest one called the Pill.
customer_reviews.author: George bridges

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. It is perfectly as described and sturdily made.
customer_reviews.author: TheNewWinch

customer_reviews.title: Great Kendama
customer_reviews.text: It's a great Kendama but it chips easily. Mine fell off our porch and I found it a month later in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Smith

customer_reviews.title: but kids still like it.
customer_reviews.text: Solid item. Paint was half gone by second day, but kids still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Paint comes off easy
customer_reviews.text: I had it for 5 days the eye is gone so ok and not mine is just green now good luck
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three of these for my child and nieces. The paint chipped almost immediately after they started playing with them. The faces are so cute, but they are just stickers, so those should be falling off any day now. Otherwise these are really fun toys, I just wish the paint could be a little better (chip-free).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. My only criticism is that the paint chipped after a week's worth of use when my son dropped it on the floor
customer_reviews.author: lbvb

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Love how much focus it demands in the user. Hand-eye coordination, etc. Whether a child or an adult, this toy keeps one occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Bossinger

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for a starter
customer_reviews.text: I think that is is ok because, the sting is really well and it works good. But on the other hand when you play with it for at least a day it gets chiped very badly, but still a good kendama
customer_reviews.author: Ty

product_meta.title: Kaleb Kendama with Green Sour Face Ball and Extra String
product_meta.description:
Kaleb Kendama brings the simple yet extremely fun ancient Japanese ball and cup toy to you. Made of solid wood this Kendama will come exactly as pictured above. We will include an extra replacement string with every Kendama toy. This skill based toy gives hours and hours of fun as you master each new Kendama trick. With dozens of possible tricks and combination of sequential tricks the possibilities are endless.

- Premium & Original Kaleb Kendama
- Extra String & Sticker Included
- Solid Real Wood Toy
- 7.25" Inches Tall - Traditional Size
- Hours & Hours of Active Play Fun - Great With Friends
- Buy a Kaleb Kendama today and start mastering new tricks. 

Approximate Specifications:
Weight: 160g
Ball Weight: 85g
Ball Diameter: 2.35" inches
Overall Height Including Ball: 7.25" inches (Traditional Standard Size)

Note: Please play with your Kendama with care as the item can cause injuries. Kaleb Kendama's are designed for play by children over 9. Also all Kendamas will show wear which is normal after use including chipping of the paint on the ball.
feature_bullets: Hours & Hours of Active Play Fun - Great With Friends

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
